channel.title: Haskell on Robhar
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Robhar

item.title: Funky Functional
item.description: It’s difficult to completely forget about your old habits and I found you shouldn’t, you should be completely open to new concepts and be willing to learn with patience and practice. But the imperative/OO concepts can be used to form better intuitions about functional concepts. Disclaimer: The following article is based on my own experience learning functional programming. I still have a long way to go, so please correct me if something seems out of place!
